questions.question: 1. Mankar was performing 3-bit binary multiplication 101*110, his friend asked him what the multiplier is, help him in this task

explanations.b: In multiplication the second term is called the multiplier

questions.question: 2. The Result obtained on binary multiplication of 1101 * 1011
3. Underflow is a condition that happens when

answers.b: the result that is smaller than the smallest number obtained
answers.c: We got a NaN on our computer screen

explanations.b: Overflow is the result that is smaller than the smallest number obtained

explanations.d: Binary multiplication is used in all these areas

questions.question: 5. We can perform binary multiplication is ____ ways

explanations.c: Binary multiplication can be performed in 2 ways namely parallel and binary multiplier via shift method.
